data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Mahasamund, Chhattisgarh, India a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Mahasamund, Chhattisgarh, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the county of Mahasamund prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 11,361 believers find a person of peace today among the 1,021,439 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Father, help the 11,361 believers in Mahasamund to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Solaha people.
Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the county of Mahasamund.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Mahasamund to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.section_summary:
the county of Mahasamund, Chhattisgarh, India has a population of 1,032,800.

We estimate Mahasamund has 11,361 people who might know Jesus, 12,531 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,008,908 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 1,008,908 lost people in  Mahasamund, Chhattisgarh, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.
